name: RomanCartWPPluginStd
author: Justin Edwards (Eddicted)

sections.description:
Provides shortcodes that can easily be included in page or post text to simplify
integration with the RomanCart website.

Improved features to come in our pro edition coming soon will be:

  • Image uploads
  • Customer instruction uploads
  • Easy admin panel to manage uploads and store ID
  • Easy to use short code for all pages

This will be available here: Eddicted Plug Ins
sections.installation:
1. Upload the RomanCartWPPluginStd folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Admin -> Settings -> RomanCart page and set your RomanCart StoreId.
  4. use the [romancart] shortcodes in your pages and posts as outlined on the settings page
sections.faq:
Where do I get a RomanCart StoreId (I already have a RomanCart account)?

You have to enter the StoreId whenever you log into the RomanCart website.
It’s the exact same number that you enter into the settings page for this plugin.

Where do I get a RomanCart StoreId (I do not have a RomanCart account)?

You can signup for a RomanCart account for free (as at the time of writing – Apr 2014)
using the following url:
RomanCart Registration

Where do I get support for this plugin

Use the community support forums here on WordPress.org for the free version

1.1

1.0

  • This is the very first version.
